content: Open saved document in new tab

comment.text: "Opens a saved document in a new tab."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Բացել պահպանված փաստաթուղթը նոր ներդիրում' is a literal translation but doesn't quite convey the intended meaning of 'Open saved document in new tab' in a natural Armenian way. "Ներդիրում" (in tab) is a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural phrasing like 'Բացել պահպանված փաստաթուղթը առանձին աշխատանքային էկրանում' (Open saved document in a separate workspace) or 'Բացել պահպանված փաստաթուղթը առանձին պատուհանում' (Open saved document in a separate window).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ບັນທືກໄວ້' (banthuek vai) can be shortened to 'ບັນທືກ' (banthuek) for a more natural and concise translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ເປີດເອກະສານທີ່ບັນທືກໃນແຖບໃໝ່

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Abrir o documento guardado numa nova aba' is not the most natural or common way to express 'Open saved document in new tab' in Portuguese. While technically correct, it's a bit literal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Abrir o documento salvo numa nova aba

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'guardado' is correct, 'salvo' is more commonly used in this context to mean 'saved'.

The translation 'Abrir o documento salvo numa pasta nova' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'Open saved document in new tab'. 'Pasta nova' literally means 'new folder,' whereas the English implies a 'new tab' in a browser or application.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Abrir o documento salvo em uma nova aba

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'පටිත්තක' (patitthak) is likely a misspelling. The more common and accurate word for 'tab' in this context would be 'වෙනිත්ත' (venitta).
While the translation is understandable, the phrasing 'නව පටිත්තක අරින්න' is slightly awkward. A more natural translation would use a more standard verb for 'open' in this context.
The Slovak translation uses 'Otevřít' which is Czech, not Slovak. The correct Slovak word is 'Otvoriť'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Otvoriť uložený dokument na novej karte

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "Open saved document" is better translated as "Прикажи сачувани документ" or "Отвори приказ сачуваног документа". "Отвори сачуван документ" is grammatically correct, but less idiomatic in Serbian.
